bug.author: teclea
bug.summary: Error Moving Images Within the Container
bug.description: The following error was received from within my dataset directory in the Coco Annotator UI: "No images found in directory." This error occurred after moving a temporary image folder into the dataset directory from within the container on a Ubuntu system. The following command was used in the interactive shell: $ sudo mv /data/datasets/temp/some_image_folder /data/datasets/SomeDataset/ A shell running the annotator_flask container shows that the directory does contain the images moved, but does not reflect in the Coco Annotator UI.

comments.comment: Strange, once <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jsbroks/coco-annotator/issues/101>#101</denchmark-link> is completed you can use the rescan function.
